oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Color copyprint of Cpl. Isaac C. Wainscott
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Cpl. Isaac C. Wainscott (1839-1935) served in Co. L, 6th Tenn. Cav., USA. He enlisted in June 1862, and mustered out July 26, 1865 in Pulaski, Tenn. The 6th was active in western Tennessee and northwest Mississippi from October 1862 until May 1864.; After action in Florence, Ala. Oct. 6-7, 1864, it was sent to Nashville in time for the Battle of Nashville Dec. 15-16 and the subsequent pursuit of Gen. John Hood.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Wainscott, Isaac C.
